entry.title: https://github.com/ChristianLempa/boilerplates
entry.content: This is my personal template collection. Here you'll find templates, and configurations for various tools, and technologies.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-cloudfront-cdn
entry.content: Terraform Module that implements a CloudFront Distribution (CDN) for a custom origin.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-codebuild
entry.content: Terraform Module to easily leverage AWS CodeBuild for Continuous Integration

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-documentdb-cluster
entry.content: Terraform module to provision a DocumentDB cluster on AWS

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-efs
entry.content: Terraform Module to define an EFS Filesystem (aka NFS)

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elasticache-memcached
entry.content: Terraform Module for ElastiCache Memcached Cluster

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-msk-apache-kafka-cluster
entry.content: Terraform module to provision AWS MSK

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-multi-az-subnets
entry.content: DEPRECATED (use cloudposse/terraform-aws-dynamic-subnets instead): Terraform module for multi-AZ public and private subnets provisioning

entry.title: https://github.com/kube-hetzner/terraform-hcloud-kube-hetzner
entry.content: Optimized and Maintenance-free Kubernetes on Hetzner Cloud in one command!

entry.title: https://github.com/sidpalas/devops-directive-terraform-course
entry.content: Companion repo for complete Terraform course

entry.title: https://github.com/terraform-google-modules/terraform-google-composer
entry.content: Manages Cloud Composer v1 and v2 along with option to manage networking

entry.title: https://github.com/terraform-google-modules/terraform-google-kms
entry.content: Allows managing a keyring, zero or more keys in the keyring, and IAM role bindings on individual keys

entry.title: https://github.com/terraform-google-modules/terraform-google-vpn
entry.content: Sets up a Cloud VPN gateway
